definitions.body: :Ex 32:24 calf (as rolling or circling about ? cf. [[כַּר]] fr. [[כָּרַר]]; NH id.; Ph. (Pu.) [[עגל]] id. Lzb:336; [[ענילו]] Palm. n.pr. id. Cook:89; Aram. 9eglo0, [[עִיגְלָא]], [[עֲגַלְתָּא]], id.; As. [agalu], pl. agalê prob. calves Dl:HWB 16 (cf. against this Jen Kosmol.110, but v. also Jäger:BAS ii. 2, 286); Ar. 9gelto0 id.; Eth. 9ijlun, cf. also Hom:NS 226);—´[[ע]] abs. Ex 32:19 +; cstr. 1Sa 28:24 +; sf. [[עֶגְלֵךְ]] Ho 8:5; pl. [[עֲגׇלִים]] Ho 13:2 +; cstr. [[עֶגְלֵי]] 1Ki 12:28 +;—calf Is 11:6, Is 27:10 in sim. of leaping mts. Ps 29:6; in sim. of foot-sole of cherubim Ez Eze 1:7; [[מַרְבֵּק]] ´[[ע]] i.e. a stall-fed (fatted) calf 1Sa 28:24, in sim. Je 46:21, Mal 3:20, cf. [[מִתּוֹךְ מַרְבֵּק]] ´[[ע]] Am 6:4; [[לאׁ לֻמָָּד]] ´[[ע]] Je 31:18 an untrained calf; [[עֶגְלֵי עַמִּים]] Ps 68:31 calves of peoples, i.e. peoples like calves, so most; perh. rd. ´[[בַּעֲלֵי עמ]] Matthes Che Gunkel:Schöf. 66 f. cf. Bae; calf as sacrif. victim Mic 6:6, Le 9:2, Le 9:3, Le 9:8 (P); cut in two, in ratifying covenant Je 34:18, Je 34:19 (cf. [[עֶגְלָה]] Ge 15:9); elsewh. image of calf: made at Horeb, [[מַסֵּכָה]] ´[[ע]] Ex 32:4, Ex 32:8, De 9:16, Ne 9:18; ´[[ע]] alone Ex 32:19, Ex 32:20, Ex 32:24, Ex 32:35, De 9:21, Ps 106:19; two set up by Jerob. I in N. Isr., 1Ki 12:28, 1Ki 12:32, 2Ki 10:29, 2Ki 17:16, 2Ch 11:15, 2Ch 13:8, cf. Ho 8:5, Ho 8:6 ([[עגְלֵךְ]], [[שׁׂמְרוֹן]] ´[[ע]]), Ho 13:2; also Ho 10:5 (v. 1. [[עֶגְלָה]] ad fin.).
